name: Requiem (itch)
description:
In this choreographed vertical shmup you play as Wolfgang, a great creator who blames himself for the end of world peace and the rise of a tyrant. To wash the blood from his hands he builds a vessel, the K. 626 to take one final flight. With only 56 minutes of fuel this is a journey he won't return from.

- Play the first 3 songs of Mozart's Requiem: Introitus, Kyrie, and Dies irae

- Choreographed shmup gameplay: the world and enemies move in sync with the music

- Extensive upgrade system: encourages multiple play throughs on various difficulties while you improve you ship and your skills on each flight
